page.title: 08Employment at Ballantrae.
page.content: 8 farms employ 14 workers.3 hotels, 3 grocers,general store,baker,cobbler, hairdresser,bank,post office,cafe, restaurant, garage,employ 43 in all. School has 9 staff.3 joiners<1 is also undertaker>employ 9 men,1 has builder and bookeeper.Roof contractor-4 staff, 2 self employed painters,Strathclyde Regional Council Roads Dept-5 men, Kyle and Carrick Parks-4 men,5 deep sea fishers,7 part time salmon fishers 2 doctors,receptionist,minister,church cleaner,music teacher,2 self employed gardeners,3 part time chimney sweeps,1 full+1 part time Cummunity Centre care takers,1 librarian,1 public toilet attendant,3 social work home helps,6 private home helps,2 policemen,5 long distance lorry drivers,minibus driver, 2 persons deliver mail,a registrar of births,marriages,deaths.41 employed out of district.25 unemployed.
